jah andstaurraidedun þo.
MARK 14.6 iþ Iesus qaþ:
letiþ þo;
duƕe izai usþriutiþ?
þannu goþ waurstw waurhta bi mis.
MARK 14.7 sinteino auk þans unledans habaiþ miþ izwis, jah þan wileiþ, maguþ im waila taujan;
iþ mik ni sinteino habaiþ.
MARK 14.8 þatei habaida so gatawida;
faursnau salbon mein leik du usfilha.
MARK 14.9 amen, qiþa izwis:
þisƕaruh þei merjada so aiwaggeljo and alla manaseþ, jah þatei gatawida so rodjada du gamundai izos.
MARK 14.10 jah Iudas Iskarioteis, ains þize twalibe, galaiþ du þaim gudjam, ei galewidedi ina im.
MARK 14.11 iþ eis gahausjandans faginodedun jah gahaihaitun imma faihu giban;
jah sokida ƕaiwa gatilaba ina galewidedi.
MARK 14.12 jah þamma frumistin daga azwme, þan paska salidedun, qeþun du imma þai siponjos is:
ƕar wileis ei galeiþandans manwjaima, ei matjais paska?
MARK 14.13 jah insandida twans siponje seinaize qaþuh du im:
gaggats in þo baurg, jah gamoteiþ igqis manna kas watins bairands:
gaggats afar þamma, MARK 14.14 jah þadei inngaleiþai, qiþaits þamma heiwafraujin þatei laisareis qiþiþ:
ƕar sind saliþwos þarei paska miþ siponjam meinaim matjau?
MARK 14.15 jah sa izwis taikneiþ kelikn mikilata, gastrawiþ, manwjata;
jah jainar manwjaiþ unsis.
MARK 14.16 jah usiddjedun þai siponjos...
...MARK 14.41 sai, galewjada sunus mans in handuns frawaurhtaize.
MARK 14.42 urreisiþ,
gaggam!
sai, sa lewjands mik atneƕida.
MARK 14.43 jah sunsaiw nauhþanuh at imma rodjandin qam Iudas, sums þize twalibe, jah miþ imma managei miþ hairum jah triwam fram þaim auhumistam gudjam jah bokarjam jah sinistam.
MARK 14.44 at-gaf-uh-þan sa lewjands ina im bandwon qiþands:
þammei kukjau, sa ist:
greipiþ þana jah tiuhiþ arniba.
MARK 14.45 jah qimands sunsaiw, atgaggands du imma qaþ:
rabbei, rabbei!
jah kukida imma.
MARK 14.46 iþ eis uslagidedun handuns ana ina jah undgripun ina.
MARK 14.47 iþ ains sums þize atstandandane imma uslukands hairu sloh skalk auhumistins gudjins jah afsloh imma auso þata taihswo.
MARK 14.48 jah andhafjands Iesus qaþ du im:
swe du waidedjin urrunnuþ miþ hairum jah triwam greipan mik.
MARK 14.49 daga ƕammeh was at izwis in alh laisjands jah ni gripuþ mik:
ak ei usfullnodedeina bokos.
MARK 14.50 jah afletandans ina gaþlauhun allai.
MARK 14.51 jah ains sums juggalauþs laistida afar imma biwaibiþs leina ana naqadana;
jah gripun is þai juggalaudeis.
MARK 14.52 iþ is bileiþands þamma leina naqaþs gaþlauh faura im.
MARK 14.53 jah gatauhun Iesu du auhumistin gudjin;
jah garunnun miþ imma auhumistans gudjans allai jah þai sinistans jah bokarjos.
MARK 14.54 jah Paitrus fairraþro laistida afar imma, unte qam in garda þis auhumistins gudjins;
jah was sitands miþ andbahtam jah warmjands sik at liuhada.
MARK 14.55 iþ þai auhumistans gudjans jah alla so gafaurds sokidedun ana Iesu weitwodiþa du afdauþjan ina jah ni bigetun.
MARK 14.56 managai auk galiug weitwodidedun ana ina, jah samaleikos þos weitwodiþos ni wesun.
MARK 14.57 jah sumai usstandandans galiug weitwodidedun ana ina qiþandans: MARK 14.58 þatei
weis gahausidedum qiþandan ina þatei
ik gataira alh þo handuwaurhton jah bi þrins dagans anþara unhanduwaurhta gatimrja.
MARK 14.59 jah ni swa samaleika was weitwodiþa ize.
MARK 14.60 jah usstandands sa auhumista gudja in midjaim frah Iesu qiþands:
niu andhafjis waiht,
ƕa þai ana þuk weitwodjand?
MARK 14.61 iþ is þahaida jah waiht ni andhof.
aftra sa auhumista gudja frah ina jah qaþ du imma:
þu is Xristus sa sunus þis þiuþeigins?
MARK 14.62 iþ is qaþuh:
ik im;
jah gasaiƕiþ þana sunu mans af taihswon sitandan mahtais jah qimandan miþ milhmam himinis.
